leitej.util.fs.host

Class HostFileSystemNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • leitej.util.fs.AbstractNode<HostFileSystem,HostFileSystemNode>
      • leitej.util.fs.host.HostFileSystemNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<HostFileSystemNode>

    public final class HostFileSystemNode
extends AbstractNode<HostFileSystem,HostFileSystemNode>
    Author:
    Julio Leite
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long changeTime() 
      boolean create()
      Stores node to the file system.
      long createTime() 
      boolean exists()
      Asserts this node is stored.
      HostFileSystemNode[] list()
      Retrieves all existing sub nodes.
      byte[] md5() 
      HostFileSystemNode moveTo(Path dest)
      Moves the information of this node to a new one.
      If isGroup also moves all sub nodes.
      The destiny can not be a sub path.
      This node is removed from the file system if destination node is not equals to this one.
      java.io.InputStream read(java.lang.Long offset, java.lang.Long length)
      Gives an input stream with the last stored information of the node.
      boolean remove()
      Removes node from the file system.
      If isGroup also removes all sub nodes.
      long size()

      Truncates information.
      void write(java.io.InputStream in, java.lang.Long offset, java.lang.Long length)
      Stores information in the node.
      The argument in is closed in a finally block at the end of execution.
